extracted.title: FDA Cybersecurity Risk Management and Compliance Services
extracted.agency: HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, DEPARTMENT OF
extracted.office: FDA OFFICE OF ACQ GRANT SVCS
extracted.contracting_office_address: 4041 Powder Mill Road 4th Floor Beltsville, MD 20705 USA
extracted.description_text: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is issuing this source sought notice as a means of conducting market research, pursuant to FAR Part 10 Market Research, to identify potential parties from the marketplace capable of providing professional services for Cybersecurity Risk Management and Compliance Services. This is a SOURCES SOUGHT ONLY, not a Request for Quote (RFQ) and does not commit the Government to award a contract now or in the future. The purpose of this sources sought is to identify SMALL BUSINESSES, specifically SBA certified 8(a) vendors, in the following GSA Multiple Award Schedule (MAS) categories with the capabilities to provide the services needed for this requirement.
